AzureWebJobsStorage: Set in user-secrets in dev, app service Connection Strings in Azure production
AzureWebJobsDashboard: Set in user-secrets in dev, app service Connection Strings in Azure production

ConnectionStrings.Default: Set in appsettings.Development.json in dev, app service Connection Strings in Azure production

App.AdminFullName: Set in user-secrets in dev, app service Application Settings in production
App.Name: New Albums via Email

Mailgun.ApiKey: Set in user-secrets in dev, app service Application Settings in Azure production
Mailgun.Domain: Set in user-secrets in dev, app service Application Settings in Azure production

Spotify.ClientId: Set in user-secrets in dev, app service Application Settings in Azure production
Spotify.ClientSecret: Set in user-secrets in dev, app service Application Settings in Azure production
